plot: Set in Zambia, THE COLA ROAD follows the launch of the first trial to use Coca-Cola's crates and distribution know-how to deliver life-saving anti-diarrhea kits
title: The Cola Road
plot_es: Set in Zambia, THE COLA ROAD follows the launch of the first trial to use Coca-Cola's crates and distribution know-how to deliver life-saving anti-diarrhea kits
plot_en: Set in Zambia, THE COLA ROAD follows the launch of the first trial to use Coca-Cola's crates and distribution know-how to deliver life-saving anti-diarrhea kits
